alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Richland (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 02 at 10:44PM CDT until April 02 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RICHLAND AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN PARISHES... At 1044 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Warden to near Mangham, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Crowville and Warden around 1055 PM CDT. Bakers around 1100 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
